articles.content: On Gonzaga's 60 points in the paint: I feel like they were just capitalizing on every opportunity they got. If they saw a loophole in our transition defense, they kept their eyes on it. If their big … [+639 chars]

articles.title: Rafer Johnson, 1960 Olympic decathlon champion, dies at 86 - NBC News
articles.description: Rafer Johnson, who won the decathlon at the 1960 Rome Olympics and helped subdue Robert F. Kennedy’s assassin in 1968, died Wednesday. He was 86.
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES Rafer Johnson, who won the decathlon at the 1960 Rome Olympics and helped subdue Robert F. Kennedys assassin in 1968, died Wednesday. He was 86.
